thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden
thread.title_full: Hidden - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nicoley191
title: Hidden
text: I had a business trip to NYC and the hotel of choice was Club Quarters World Trade Center. This hotel is within blocks of the 9/11 Memorial as well as shopping and eateries. The subway was a block or two away from the hotel as well. The hotel staff was friendly and knowledgeable of things in the area. Hotel room was quite roomy for a New York City hotel room. My room was clean. Hotel was quiet. Complimentary internet, as well as snacks, water, soda, fruit, hot tea and coffee provided through out the day.
